Replies.Reply: He's got a meeting at the high school. We're supposed to walk home with Kim...
She's too busy. Let's go by ourselves.
CONTINUED : He strides away. Robin's eyes remain on Nick and Kim.
C'mon, Kimbo, I may be hard up...
Great... Anyway, I'm in charge of the sound system tonight.
I'm building an atomic bomb in shop.
I'm testing the board... I didn't hear you... nobody's supposed to be here yet...
All set, Miss Benton. Just have Davy roll the tapes.
You look almost like a woman!
Nick? Oh, he's all right, I guess.
Debbie was gonna lend me her new record. Look, you go on home by yourself. Tell Mom I'll be a little late.
Morning, Mom. We got any yogurt?
I've been trying to forget. The boy's too sure of himself.
Have you got a date for tonight?
I happen to know Jude might be available. Of course, she is older, but...
Alex! Jude's cute... Besides, she's funny and really smart.
Not bad but it's not romance.
If you get a chance, dance with Jude once or twice, okay?
Kelly says he's a pervert, spying on the girls undressing in the locker room.
I'.ve got to decide on my hair style for tonight.
Yes, as a matter of fact... I was just...
You really ought to tell him that.
You and Nick haven't been together in ages.
Really? So who are you going with tonight?

Replies.Didascalie: (coughs and finally begins, slowly, in a  STILTED MANNER)

Replies.Reply: But, Mr. Weller, tonight's the prom...
That's not true! Alex was trying to help me.
You wearing that green gown tonight?
I am excited, it's just... in some ways it's such an awful day... It's Robin's day...
My mother's all upset, as usual.
The Queen of the Prom is determined not to let it get to her... She must maintain her... whatever, at all costs..
That's my father... I've got to go, Okay?
Vicki's sex life is more talk than action. Besides, Drew wants you.
I know it's not much of a picture, Wendy, but you didn't have to go that far...
I'd like to see my f ather .
Oh... There was... Somebody broke a mirror in the shower room...
Because he can't get in anywhere else!
Yeah... I've calmed down a bit...
And he didn't leave a message?
Strange... He usually gives me a ride home.
Guess I won't be seeing you again.
Why are you doing it now?
I think getting dressed up and going out might be good for her.
Nothing's cooking, Mom. You must've forgotten.
I wouldn't take it without asking you...
You want to help or just leer?
Pin this on me, you creep, late.
I want to play 'Murder.' Who's the killer?
You'll never catch me. Hide your eyes, killer!
Now you've done it, you idiot!
Are you crazy? They'll put us in jail!
If we tell anyone, they'll say it's our fault. Who'd believe it was an accident?
How the hell do I know?
You wish! Nick is King of the Prom, you happen to be Queen of the Prom... that's all there is to it, Hammond... As far as anything else... Nick is mine...
I'm telling you, okay? Stay away from Nick!
It's not who you go with, honey...
Wait and see, bitch... Just wait and see...
We'll talk about it later, lover.
You never had it so good as with me.
I'LL WAI Wendy turns to see Nick's reaction but he is already walking towards the cafeteria. The irate girl glares after him.
I'll buy you one for Christmas, all right? Now, how do I know you're serious?
I don't want anyone hurt... not badly.
Lou, shouldn't we go over this.
If you ever try anything like that again, you cow!
What I'm wearing now?... Oh, tonight!
Now, are we all set?... It better.
The killer is coming for you!
It's just Wendy. She's pissed off.
Three months ago... you can't tell Wendy anything she doesn't want to hear.
Wendy, for Christ sake, I never...
I told her to leave me alone.
I don't care who. Just somebody else!
I'm... I want you to know that...
I mean... I know what you're feeling... I've...
An obscene call... and not very obscene at that!
I can see why... How old are you, Slick?
I've heard about guys like you...
I'm going straight to Winston High, understand?
You think this is the time to study?
Yeah? Well, as a matter of fact..
My date is uh, not that certain...
So I guess we're both maybe not going...
See you at eight, same spot!
Yeah -- I don't think he's gonna be too good for my diet...
I don't wanta go to jail...
On the telephone. It sounded so evil!
Steady? You mean persistent, don't you, darling?
I'm not like the others, Kim.
I'm afraid if I don't make it with him he'll find somebody who will.
I think I'll let Drew do it.
Where is she? Where is Robin?
Kim! Turn that music down. You're driving me crazy!
No, dear. Fix yourself a good meal. You're getting awfully thin.
It doesn't help. You know that!
Don't forget we're going to the cemetery this afternoon. I want Robin to have her flowers.
Oh.. I don't know what I was thinking.
Have you seen the new satin pantsuit I'm wearing?
Kim, have you got any of my makeup?
That deep red lipstick, you remember? You liked it...
It was on my dressing table, I set it aside...
Why does this always happen at the last minute?
I told you I'd bought it.
I'm not going to look ridiculous!
You don't want me to go.
You don't think I can do it... You think I'll embarrass you...
Then why are you saying these things?
You treat me like a child! I'm your wife!
Why did you bring them here?
I'll tell you, Vi, I'm thinking of starting up an armed robbery course at the high school..
I just hope there's no trouble at the prom tonight...
And how is the next queen of the Winston High Junior-Senior Prom?
You'd better get ready. He's fitting you in early before his other... people.
Alex?... What the hell're you doing?
I'm.. I'm thinking we might have a fire hazzard here, all these extra lights.
I've got to go now, Vi... We'll be there within the hour...
If you're not off school grounds in five minutes, I'll have you arrested for trespassing.
Have the nurse take a look at you, then get back here.
I'm getting too old for this.
Your mother's been hounding me to get it done... You got nay message?
I told that woman to tell you I had a meeting and couldn't drive you home.
One minute she's depressed, the next she's bubbling over like a child... She wants to go with me tonight.
let's go, we can't be late...
I'm joking, Vi, it's beautiful.._ C'mon...
Now, Vi, if you think it's going to be too difficult for you...
T Certainly I want you to go, just saying...
I'm sorry... I didn't mean to upset you...
Could I have one of those? My nerves are shot this morning.
Fine. I just thank God he was too young to really understand what happened to his sister.
Sykes may have some problems, but he's no Peeping Tom. He's been thoroughly checked out.
20,  23 CONTINUED: 23 They climb the broad front steps of the high school.
Have a seat, Vivian. I'll be right in.
Seven years ago today Robin was killed.
Tonight's the Junior-Senior Prom at our high school. Robin would have been sixteen, She and Alex.
Kimmy's my princess. Sometimes she'll get depressed for a while... but it never lasts long. Young people seem so much more... resilient.
Something more serious than her daughter's death?
You're early today. Plenty of time to study with no one to bother you.
Oh God! They told me you wouldn't be in till nine!
Oh... no, I'm your Working Girl Hammond stares, wide-eyed.
Well you see, Mr. Hammond, the, air conditioner fan was set for high but...
There are some gentlemen here to see you, Mr. Hammond.
I didn't ask... But one looks a little like that child in the picture on your desk.
No, he's not. He said he'd be back but...
A mirror? Seven years bad luck...
Nope. Haven't seen him all afternoon.
Let me finish and I'll give you a lift.
Guess again. Three different students asked me to the prom tonight... I thought you had to be enrolled!
Not with any of them. Know any good-looking fathers?
Whatever! I have some important calls to make. Please see that I'm not disturbed...
, and put all this back where it belongs!

Replies.Reply: Horrified, Kelly drops the phone. The DOORBELL RINGS.
You be home for dinner, Wendy?
I'm glad to see you, too.
What'd you get, a heavy breather?
Turned you on did he? Maybe I should try that!
Hell, you should be glad. A lot of girls would love to have someone steady like me.
You wanta take care of yourself, man... Kim's expecting a lot from you tonight...
Just some girls... If they're good lookin' I give 'em a ride.
Cheap?... that's a two hundred dollar waterbed there...
You going to the prom tonight?
Not me. My date got sick.
For a guy who moves so fast around a disco floor, you are the slowest goddamn thing...
I thought you two broke up.
Aren't you going with the Hammond girl? The principal's daughter?
God, I wish I had your women problems.
Missed you on the bus today.
I thought you were too big to hide.
Poor girl must be exhausted. Look how he has to hold her up...
She's smiling, Nick. Big grin spread all over her face.
Here comes the incredible hunk himself.
You kidding? That was last year.
Positive. I heard her say she's had the hots for him since they met!
He's got a crush on Kim!
He keeps making Kim stay after school in detention study hall for no reason... Just so he can be near her.
Dual headers... thinks he's a fox... Dust'll run you... long and slinky and tight... swings like my mother... how much for half a lid?
I knew there was some reason Kim wouldn't go out with me. She likes girls!
You girls get bored with each other, I'm always around, you know?
Wonder who'll get off with just a warning?
I was just foolin' around with this girl...
when this -- your son tackled me and...
Watch for me, little girl. You know I'm just a kiss away.
I'm uh... a little short on cash..
Yeah? Okay then, a couple of burgers, a large fries... what kind of beer you got?
All right, all right... don't get nervous... Gimme a coke...
Whatta you mean, serious? I hate that school, Hammond and his asshole family...
You got it... anything your little heart desires...
I'll take care of it, Scout's honor... Don't worry about it...
Since you obviously find your own words more interesting than those of Farnsworth on the anatomy of a frog...

Listen for your cue, king and queen...

Wait for the spotlights and your music cue, then dance...

Kim and Nick, start down the..
The King and Queen of the George Winston High School Junion-Senior Prom for 1980 -- Nick McBride and Kim Hammond!
These two seniors were selected by their fellow students as the most popular boy and girl in the class..
Nick is a three-sport letterman and president of the Key Club. He plans to attend State University in the fall.
Kim is the head cheerleader and ranked number one on the girls' tennis team. She hopes to become a teacher.

er's face is revealed. It is the nine-year-old Alex.
